MIMoSA Model Formula

Source: R/mimosa_formula.R
mimosa_formula.Rd

MIMoSA Model Formula

mimosa_formula(T2 = TRUE, PD = TRUE)

Arguments

T2

Logical. Should the terms including T2 be included?
PD

Logical. Should the terms including PD be included?

Value

A formula object

Examples

mimosa_formula()
#> gold_standard ~ FLAIR_10 * FLAIR + FLAIR_20 * FLAIR + PD_10 * 
#>     PD + PD_20 * PD + T2_10 * T2 + T2_20 * T2 + T1_10 * T1 + 
#>     T1_20 * T1 + FLAIRonT1_intercepts + FLAIRonT2_intercepts + 
#>     FLAIRonPD_intercepts + T1onT2_intercepts + T1onPD_intercepts + 
#>     T2onPD_intercepts + T1onFLAIR_intercepts + T2onFLAIR_intercepts + 
#>     PDonFLAIR_intercepts + T2onT1_intercepts + PDonT1_intercepts + 
#>     PDonT2_intercepts + FLAIRonT1_slopes + FLAIRonT2_slopes + 
#>     FLAIRonPD_slopes + T1onT2_slopes + T1onPD_slopes + T2onPD_slopes + 
#>     T1onFLAIR_slopes + T2onFLAIR_slopes + PDonFLAIR_slopes + 
#>     T2onT1_slopes + PDonT1_slopes + PDonT2_slopes
#> <environment: 0x55a3c0cc75b8>
mimosa_formula(T2 = FALSE)
#> gold_standard ~ FLAIR_10 * FLAIR + FLAIR_20 * FLAIR + PD_10 * 
#>     PD + PD_20 * PD + T1_10 * T1 + T1_20 * T1 + FLAIRonT1_intercepts + 
#>     FLAIRonPD_intercepts + T1onPD_intercepts + T1onFLAIR_intercepts + 
#>     PDonFLAIR_intercepts + PDonT1_intercepts + FLAIRonT1_slopes + 
#>     FLAIRonPD_slopes + T1onPD_slopes + T1onFLAIR_slopes + PDonFLAIR_slopes + 
#>     PDonT1_slopes
#> <environment: 0x55a3c0d3ae38>
mimosa_formula(PD = FALSE)
#> gold_standard ~ FLAIR_10 * FLAIR + FLAIR_20 * FLAIR + T2_10 * 
#>     T2 + T2_20 * T2 + T1_10 * T1 + T1_20 * T1 + FLAIRonT1_intercepts + 
#>     FLAIRonT2_intercepts + T1onT2_intercepts + T1onFLAIR_intercepts + 
#>     T2onFLAIR_intercepts + T2onT1_intercepts + FLAIRonT1_slopes + 
#>     FLAIRonT2_slopes + T1onT2_slopes + T1onFLAIR_slopes + T2onFLAIR_slopes + 
#>     T2onT1_slopes
#> <environment: 0x55a3c0d9a900>
mimosa_formula(T2 = FALSE, PD = FALSE)
#> gold_standard ~ FLAIR_10 * FLAIR + FLAIR_20 * FLAIR + T1_10 * 
#>     T1 + T1_20 * T1 + FLAIRonT1_intercepts + T1onFLAIR_intercepts + 
#>     FLAIRonT1_slopes + T1onFLAIR_slopes
#> <environment: 0x55a3c0df45a8>
